application

类 ImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ImageLoader

  • public class ImageLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The imageLoader class is used to load the image adn show the fileChooser
    作者:
    AgriSoft

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ImageLoader.ImageFileFilter
      The class is used to control the images' format. only jpg, png, gif and bmp allowed

      Constructor of the imageLoader class

      Will pop up a dialog to ask the user whether to overwriting 0 or add to existing one 1.

      Import a list of images by the user, then return the list of images from the user input

    • 方法详细资料

      • importImages

        public java.util.List<TaggableImage> importImages(ApplicationWindow app)
        Import a list of images by the user, then return the list of images from the user input
        参数:
        app - - ApplicaitonWindow
        返回:
        List - the list of images input

      • ImportImageAction

        public int ImportImageAction(ApplicationWindow app)
        Will pop up a dialog to ask the user whether to overwriting 0 or add to existing one 1.
        参数:
        app - - ApplicationWindow
        返回:
        Integer - overwriting or no select image 0, add to existing one 1, cancel 2

        public void setSelectedFiletoDefaultValue(java.io.File[] input)
